verses.text: \w At|strong="G1519"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* conclusion \w of|strong="G3056"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w teaching|strong="G3056"\w*, \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w withdrew|strong="G2424"\w* \w from|strong="G2064"\w* \w Galilee|strong="G1056"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w went|strong="G2064"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w that|strong="G3588"\w* \w district|strong="G3725"\w* \w of|strong="G3056"\w* \w Judea|strong="G2449"\w* \w which|strong="G3588"\w* \w is|strong="G3588"\w* \w on|strong="G1519"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w other|strong="G4008"\w* \w side|strong="G4008"\w* \w of|strong="G3056"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w Jordan|strong="G2446"\w*.

\w Great|strong="G4183"\w* \w crowds|strong="G3793"\w* followed \w him|strong="G2532"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w cured|strong="G2323"\w* \w them|strong="G1438"\w* \w there|strong="G1563"\w*.

Presently \w some|strong="G3588"\w* \w Pharisees|strong="G5330"\w* \w came|strong="G4334"\w* \w up|strong="G4334"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w him|strong="G3588"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w*, \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w test|strong="G3985"\w* \w him|strong="G3588"\w*, \w said|strong="G3004"\w*, ‘\w Has|strong="G2532"\w* \w a|strong="G2532"\w* \w man|strong="G3956"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* right \w to|strong="G2532"\w* divorce \w his|strong="G3956"\w* \w wife|strong="G1135"\w* \w for|strong="G2532"\w* \w every|strong="G3956"\w* \w cause|strong="G2596"\w*?’

\wj ‘Haven’\+w t|strong="G3588"\+w* \+w you|strong="G3754"\+w* read,’\wj* \w replied|strong="G3004"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G3004"\w*, \wj ‘\+w that|strong="G3754"\+w* \+w at|strong="G1161"\+w* \+w the|strong="G2532"\+w* beginning \+w the|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w Creator|strong="G2936"\+w* “\+w made|strong="G4160"\+w* \+w them|strong="G3588"\+w* male \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w female|strong="G2338"\+w*,”\wj*

\wj \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w said|strong="G3004"\+w* – “\+w For|strong="G1519"\+w* \+w this|strong="G3778"\+w* \+w reason|strong="G1752"\+w* \+w a|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w man|strong="G3778"\+w* \+w will|strong="G1510"\+w* \+w leave|strong="G2641"\+w* \+w his|strong="G1519"\+w* \+w father|strong="G3962"\+w* \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w mother|strong="G3384"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w be|strong="G1510"\+w* united \+w to|strong="G1519"\+w* \+w his|strong="G1519"\+w* \+w wife|strong="G1135"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w the|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w man|strong="G3778"\+w* \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w his|strong="G1519"\+w* \+w wife|strong="G1135"\+w* \+w will|strong="G1510"\+w* \+w become|strong="G1510"\+w* \+w one|strong="G1520"\+w*”?\wj*

‘\w Why|strong="G5101"\w*, \w then|strong="G3767"\w*,’ \w they|strong="G2532"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w*, ‘\w did|strong="G2532"\w* \w Moses|strong="G3475"\w* direct \w that|strong="G2532"\w* \w a|strong="G2532"\w* \w man|strong="G5101"\w* \w should|strong="G2532"\w* serve \w his|strong="G1438"\w* wife \w with|strong="G2532"\w* \w a|strong="G2532"\w* notice \w of|strong="G2532"\w* separation \w and|strong="G2532"\w* divorce \w her|strong="G1325"\w*?’
